mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Any Time", "Grundoon's Mxtrzrgi", and "Raley's Romp" ROUND DANCES "Crystal Two-step", "Salty Dog Rag", and "Drifting Waltz (R/M)" SPECIAL FEATURES "Trends for Tips - From Top to Toe", "The Square Dance Fashion Show", "Another Milestone (Our Birthday)", "A Family Grows from Do Sa Do's", "Asilomar - Questions and Answers", "San Diego's Calling - Registration", and "Index to Sets in Order calls". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "The Square Dance Picture", "The Square of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
